reuters.title: COPLEY PROPERTIES INC <COP> 4TH QTR NET
reuters.body: Shr 30 cts vs 36 cts Net 1,211,000 vs 1,428,000 Revs 1,536,000 vs 1,743,000 Year Shr 1.36 dlrs vs 62 cts Net 5,438,000 vs 2,498,000 Revs 6,567,000 vs 2,971,000 NOTE: Company began operations after its July 29, 1985 public offering, therefore annual data are not directly comparable. Reuter 
